text: Inene uAll창h Uza kuwufezekisa umbono wokwenyani Awawubonisa uMthunywa waKhe. Inene nina (maMuslim) niza kungena eMasjid al-Har창m, uAll창h Ethandile ngenene nangenyaniso, nichebe iintloko zenu, iinwele zenu ziphungulwe, ningoyiki bani. Yena (uAll창h) Wazi ebeningakwazi yaye Ucwangcise kwangaphambili kunoko uloyiso olukufuphi nolo (kungekudala)
